Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Langenhagen, Maritim Airport Hotel is connected to the airport and close to Langenhagen City Shopping Centre and Brinker Park. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Silbersee and Stoeckener Markt.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 527 guestrooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming provides entertainment. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, bidets, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a steam room. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Extended parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Langenhagen, Maritim Airport Hotel is connected to the airport and close to Langenhagen City Shopping Centre and Brinker Park. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Silbersee and Stoeckener Markt.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Langenhagen City Shopping Centre - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Brinker Park - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
Silbersee - 5.1 km / 3.2 mi
Stoeckener Markt - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Berggarten - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi
Herrenhausen Gardens - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Sea Life Hannover - 7.5 km / 4.7 mi
Grosser Garten - 7.6 km / 4.8 mi
Georgengarten - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Wilhelm Busch Museum - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Lister Platz - 8.6 km / 5.3 mi
University of Hannover - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Welfenschloss - 8.7 km / 5.4 mi
Wat Dhammavihara - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
SpielBank Hannover - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi

The preferred airport for Maritim Airport Hotel is Hannover (HAJ) - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Maritim Airport Hotel is Hannover (HAJ-Hannover Airport) - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or airport and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometre.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
